roleset.name: in the region of
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.

example.name: both args
example.text: SOLINE is regional to the Southeastern region of the US (GA, FL, KY, SC, NC, LA, MS, TN, VA, AL), as well as Indiana, Puerto Rico, and the Virgin Islands.
example.arg: to the Southeastern region of the US (GA, FL, KY, SC, NC, LA, MS, TN, VA, AL), as well as Indiana, Puerto Rico, and the Virgin Islands
